select wpl.id, wpr.rule_name,wpl.point,wpl.gmt_create,wp.total from writer_point_log wpl LEFT JOIN writer_point_rule wpr ON wpl.rule_id=wpr.id LEFT JOIN writer_user wu ON wpl.user_id=wu.id LEFT JOIN writer_point wp ON wp.user_id=wu.id where 1= 1
and wu.id = #{userId}
ORDER BY wpl.gmt_create DESC
and wpl.gmt_create>DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 WEEK)
and wpl.gmt_create>DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
and wpl.gmt_create>DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR)

SELECT p.id,p.total FROM writer_point AS p
LEFT JOIN writer_user AS u ON p.user_id = u.id where p.user_id=#{userId}
